com.jacobschneider.engine.math.vectorcalc

Class CartesianScalerField

  • Object
    • AbstractScalerField
      • CartesianScalerField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manifoldable, ScalerField

    public class CartesianScalerField
extends AbstractScalerField
implements Manifoldable
    An implementation of ScalerField of the form f(x,y,z) = A*x^a + B*y^b + C*z^c.
    Author:
    Jacob

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CartesianScalerField(double[] coefficients, double[] exponents)
      Creates a scaler field of the form f(x,y,z) = A*x^a + B*y^b + C*z^c.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double dfdx(Vector3 point)
      The derivative of this scaler field with respect to x at a point.

      The derivative of this scaler field with respect to y at a point.

      The derivative of this scaler field with respect to z at a point.
      double getValue(Vector3 point)
      The scaler value returned by this scaler field at a certain point in space
      Vector3 gradient(Vector3 point)
      The gradient of the scaler field at a certain point in the space
      VectorField toVectorField()
      Converts this scaler field into a vector field corresponding to the negative gradient of this scaler field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CartesianScalerField

        public CartesianScalerField(double[] coefficients,
                            double[] exponents)
        Creates a scaler field of the form f(x,y,z) = A*x^a + B*y^b + C*z^c.
        Parameters:
        coefficients - the coefficients of the scaler field where the first, second, and third elements of the array represent A, B, and C respectively. Must be of length 3.
        exponents - the exponents of the scaler field where the first, second, and third elements of the array represent a, b, and c respectively. Must be of length 3.

    • Method Detail

        Description copied from interface: ScalerField
        The scaler value returned by this scaler field at a certain point in space
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        point - the point at which to evaluate the scaler field

        public Vector3 gradient(Vector3 point)
        Description copied from interface: ScalerField
        The gradient of the scaler field at a certain point in the space

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the resulting gradient

      • toVectorField

        public VectorField toVectorField()
        Description copied from interface: ScalerField
        Converts this scaler field into a vector field corresponding to the negative gradient of this scaler field. If this scaler field represents a potential then this function will return a force field representing the force enacted by the potential.
        Specified by:
        toVectorField in interface ScalerField
        Returns:
        a vector field equal to the negative gradient of this scaler field
